title: Does Socrates claim to know that he knows nothing? - Quora

response.answer_text: The great socrates in fact claimed that, but it shouldnt be misrepresented. of course socrates did not mean that he literally didnt know anything, his basic premise was that if we concede that we know nothing, thats the moment we can start building a robust foundation for a virtuous education. If we pretended to know everything(like many people do around the globe) we would stop questioning and investigating relevant matters, only by accepting ones ignorance, one can build knowledge.
“The ancient oracle says that I am the wisest of all the Greeks. It is because I alone of all the Greeks know that I know nothing.” ~ Socrates
